title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Mr. Miguel Angel Moratinos

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Mr. Miguel Angel Moratinos, Under Secretary General for United Nations Alliance of Civilizations (UNAOC) on Monday, 22nd April 2024,
The meeting held on the sidelines of the High Level African Counter-Terrorism Summit in Abuja (22nd to 23rd April, 2024). Discussions centered on multilateral cooperation.
